00021 MuNote::MuNote(void)
00022 {
00023         instr = 0;
00024         start = 0.0;
00025         dur = 0.0;
00026         pitch = 0;
00027         amp = 0.0;
00028         next = NULL;
00029 }

00036 // Copy Constructor
00037 MuNote::MuNote( const MuNote & inNote )
00038 {
00039         instr = inNote.instr;
00040         start = inNote.start;
00041         dur = inNote.dur;
00042         pitch = inNote.pitch;
00043         amp = inNote.amp;
00044         param = inNote.param;
00045 }

00048 // Assignment...
00049 MuNote & MuNote::operator=( const MuNote & inNote )
00050 {
00051         instr = inNote.instr;
00052         start = inNote.start;
00053         dur = inNote.dur;
00054         pitch = inNote.pitch;
00055         amp = inNote.amp;
00056         param = inNote.param;
00057         
00058         return *this;
00059 }
00060 
00061 // Equality test...
00062 bool MuNote::operator==( const MuNote & inNote )
00063 {
00064         bool result = false;
00065         if(     
00066                 ( instr == inNote.instr ) &&
00067                 ( start == inNote.start )  &&
00068                 ( dur == inNote.dur )  &&
00069                 ( pitch == inNote.pitch )  &&
00070                 ( amp == inNote.amp ) &&
00071             ( param == inNote.param )
00072            )
00073                 result = true;
00074         
00075         return result;
00076 }
00077 
00078 // Inequality test...
00079 bool MuNote::operator!=( const MuNote & inNote )
00080 {
00081         return !( *this == inNote );
00082 }

00143 void MuNote::SetPitch(cs_pitch newPitch)
00144 {
00145         pitch = newPitch.pitch + ( ( newPitch.octave - 3 ) * 12 );
00146 }
00147 
00148 void MuNote::ColapsePitch(void)
00149 {
00150         pitch = ( pitch % 12 ) + MIDDLE_C;
00151 }

00174 cs_pitch MuNote::CsPitch(void)
00175 {
00176         cs_pitch csp;
00177         csp.octave = ((pitch / 12) + OCTAVE_OFFSET);
00178         csp.pitch = ((pitch % 12));
00179         return csp;
00180 }
00181 
00182 string MuNote::PitchString(void)
00183 {
00184         string pitchString;
00185     cs_pitch p;
00186         char buff[10];
00187         
00188     p = CsPitch();
00189     sprintf(buff, "%d.", p.octave);
00190     pitchString += buff;
00191     if(p.pitch < 10)
00192         pitchString += "0";
00193     sprintf(buff, "%d", p.pitch);
00194     pitchString += buff;
00195     return pitchString;
00196 }
00197 
00198 string MuNote::CsString(void)
00199 {
00200         string cs_string;
00201         char buff[10];
00202         MuParamBlock pBlock;
00203         float paramVal = 0;
00204         short numberOfParams = 0;
00205         MuError err(MuERROR_NONE);
00206         
00207         cs_string += "i";
00208         sprintf(buff,"%d",Instr());
00209         cs_string += buff;
00210         cs_string += "\t";
00211         sprintf(buff,"%.3f",Start());
00212         cs_string += buff;
00213         cs_string += "\t";
00214         sprintf(buff,"%.3f",Dur());
00215         cs_string += buff;
00216         cs_string += "\t";
00217         cs_string +=  PitchString();
00218         cs_string += "\t";
00219         sprintf(buff,"%.3f",Amp());
00220         cs_string += buff;
00221         cs_string += "\t";
00222         
00223         pBlock = Params();
00224         numberOfParams = pBlock.Num();
00225         if( numberOfParams != 0)
00226         {
00227                 for(short k = 0; k < numberOfParams; k++)
00228                 {
00229                         err = pBlock.Val(k, &paramVal);
00230                         if(err.Get() != MuERROR_NONE)
00231                                 cout << err.Message();
00232                         else
00233                         {
00234                                 sprintf(buff,"%.3f",paramVal);
00235                                 cs_string += buff;
00236                                 cs_string += "\t";
00237                         }
00238                 }
00239         }
00240         
00241         return cs_string;
00242 }
00243 
00244 MuMIDIMessage MuNote::MIDIOn(void)
00245 {
00246         MuMIDIMessage noteOn;
00247         noteOn.status = 0x90 + ( instr - 1 );
00248         noteOn.data1 = pitch;
00249         noteOn.data2 = amp * 127;
00250         noteOn.time = start;
00251         return noteOn;
00252 }
00253 
00254 MuMIDIMessage MuNote::MIDIOff(void)
00255 {
00256         MuMIDIMessage noteOff;
00257         noteOff.status = 0x80 + ( instr - 1 );
00258         noteOff.data1 = pitch;
00259         noteOff.data2 = 0;
00260         noteOff.time = ( start + dur );
00261         return noteOff;
00262 }
